mapper.insert: insert into TESchool (id, SchoolName, SchoolOrganizationCode, SchoolRegionalismCode, SchoolAddress, SchoolRunningType, SchoolNature, SchoolSuperior, StuNumbers, PrincipalCertID, PrincipalName, PrincipalContact, BranchSecurityName, BranchSecurityContact, SecurityName, SecurityContact, PoliceName, PoliceContact, SecurityNumbers, SchoolLongitude, SchoolLatitude, NetGridID) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{schoolName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{schoolOrganizationCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{schoolRegionalismCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{schoolAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{schoolRunningType,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{schoolNature,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{schoolSuperior,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stuNumbers,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{principalCertID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{principalName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{principalContact,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{branchSecurityName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{branchSecurityContact,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{securityName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{securityContact,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{policeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{policeContact,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{securityNumbers,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{schoolLongitude,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{schoolLatitude,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{netGridID,jdbcType=BIGINT})
mapper.update: update TESchool set SchoolName = #{schoolName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SchoolOrganizationCode = #{schoolOrganizationCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SchoolRegionalismCode = #{schoolRegionalismCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SchoolAddress = #{schoolAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SchoolRunningType = #{schoolRunningType,jdbcType=CHAR}, SchoolNature = #{schoolNature,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SchoolSuperior = #{schoolSuperior,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, StuNumbers = #{stuNumbers,jdbcType=INTEGER}, PrincipalCertID = #{principalCertID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PrincipalName = #{principalName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PrincipalContact = #{principalContact,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BranchSecurityName = #{branchSecurityName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BranchSecurityContact = #{branchSecurityContact,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SecurityName = #{securityName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SecurityContact = #{securityContact,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PoliceName = #{policeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PoliceContact = #{policeContact,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SecurityNumbers = #{securityNumbers,jdbcType=INTEGER}, SchoolLongitude = #{schoolLongitude,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, SchoolLatitude = #{schoolLatitude,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, NetGridID = #{netGridID,jdbcType=BIGINT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, SchoolName, SchoolOrganizationCode, SchoolRegionalismCode, SchoolAddress, SchoolRunningType, SchoolNature, SchoolSuperior, StuNumbers, PrincipalCertID, PrincipalName, PrincipalContact, BranchSecurityName, BranchSecurityContact, SecurityName, SecurityContact, PoliceName, PoliceContact, SecurityNumbers, SchoolLongitude, SchoolLatitude, NetGridID from TESchool where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

select id, SchoolName, SchoolOrganizationCode, SchoolRegionalismCode, SchoolAddress, SchoolRunningType, SchoolNature, SchoolSuperior, StuNumbers, PrincipalCertID, PrincipalName, PrincipalContact, BranchSecurityName, BranchSecurityContact, SecurityName, SecurityContact, PoliceName, PoliceContact, SecurityNumbers, SchoolLongitude, SchoolLatitude, NetGridID from TESchool

select id, SchoolName,SchoolOrganizationCode, SchoolRegionalismCode, SchoolAddress, SchoolRunningTypeName,SchoolNature, SchoolSuperior, StuNumbers,PrincipalCertID, PrincipalName, PrincipalContact, BranchSecurityName, BranchSecurityContact, SecurityName, SecurityContact, PoliceName, PoliceContact, SecurityNumbers, SchoolLongitude, SchoolLatitude, NetGridName from TESchool t1 left join TECODESchoolRunningType t2 on t1.SchoolRunningType=t2.SchoolRunningTypeValue left join TENetGrid t3 on t1.NetGridID=t3.NetGridID where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
select t2.NetGridName name,COUNT(t1.id) value FROM TESchool t1 RIGHT JOIN TENetGrid t2 on t1.NetGridID=t2.NetGridID where t2.FatherNetGridID=-1 GROUP BY t2.NetGridName
